section.heading: Office of Neighborhood Safety and Engagement establishment; appointment of Executive Director.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 21-125: § 901 of D.C. Law 21-125 provided that the change made to this section by § 101 of D.C. Law 21-125 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
